articles.author: Melissa Rudy
articles.title: Breast cancer diagnoses spiking among women under 50, new report reveals - Fox News
articles.description: Although breast cancer deaths have been declining for decades in the U.S., diagnoses have been on the uptick among women 50 and younger, according to a new report from the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:

articles.title: Gun-toting Terrorists Kill 6 at Tel Aviv Train Station as Iranian Missiles Rain Down on Israel - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Video shared by the American journalist Jim Sciutto showed the missile strikes that prompted him to leave a Tel Aviv rooftop and abandon his live report on CNN.
